[[module CSS]]
.document {
    background: white;
    box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    margin: 26px auto 0;
    max-width: 850px;
    min-height: 300px;
    padding: 24px;
    padding-top: 50px;
    padding-left: 34px;
    padding-right: 34px;
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
}

#page-title {
margin-top: 1rem;
}

table {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', sans-serif;
    font-weight: 500;
}

table strong {
    font-weight: 800 !important;
}

#page-content .wiki-content-table {
    width: 33%;
}

.basaltBanner p {
    line-height: 0px;
    margin-top: 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 3rem;
}

.basaltBanner,
.basaltIcon {
    transition-duration: 0.3s;
    transition-property: transform, box-shadow, filter, background-image;
    transform: translateZ(0);
}

.basaltBanner:hover {
    transform: scale(0.9);
}

.basaltIcon:hover {
    transform: scale(1.1);
    box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 0px 7px rgb(20, 20, 20);
}

.basaltIcon:hover>div {
    filter: drop-shadow(0px 0px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8));
}

@media (max-width: 767px) {
    .themeText {
     display: none;
    }
}

.top-left-box > .item {
display: unset;
}

[[/module]]

[[div style="display: none;"]]

[[include component:image-block
    name=Http://scpvnsandbox2.wikidot.com/local--files/jellyfish-classbar/jellyfish%20logo%20white.png |
    caption= JELLY'S ARTPAGE |
    align=center |
    width=100%
]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="basaltIcon" style="background-image: url( Http://scpvnsandbox2.wikidot.com/local--files/jellyfish-classbar/sea%20wallpaper.jpg); background-size: contain; background-position: center; filter: drop-shadow(0px 0px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)); border-radius: 50%; margin: auto; padding: 1rem 1rem 1rem 1rem; width: 7.5rem; height: 7.5rem;"]]
[[div style="background-image: url(https://i.imgur.com/UxlKFfg.png); background-size: 170px; background-position: center; background-repeat: no-repeat; margin: auto; border-radius: 50%; width: 7.5rem; height: 7.5rem;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[module CSS]]

:root {
    --title: " SCP FOUNDATION";
    --subtitle: " KEEP THE OCEANS CLEAN";
    --logo: url(http://scpvnsandbox2.wikidot.com/local--files/jellyfishthecoolkid/jellyfish%20logo.png);
    --sidesubtitle: var(--subtitle);
    --sidelogo: var(--logo);
}

[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
.barcode {
     background-image: linear-gradient(to left, #1A1333, #262949, #045459, #087353, #15C286, #ABD96D, #FBBF54, #EE6B3B, #EC0F47, #A02C5D, #700460, #022C7A);
     -webkit-background-clip: text;
     color: transparent;
     //border: 1px solid #959595;//
     opacity: 0.725;
}
[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
    --id-card-one-color: 83,141,223;
    --id-card-background-logo: url('https://i.imgur.com/chUNY2h.png');
    --id-card-background-logo-opacity: 0.1;

.foundation-id-card .profile-picture {
    border: solid 0.125rem rgb(204,204,204);
}
[[/module]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab About]]

[[div class="document"]]

+ [[size 250%]]###538DDF|Hey there, I’m JELLY THE FISH.##[[/size]]
++ [[size 125%]]###BCB3B8|//I’m a high school student living in Ho Chi Minh, VietNam.//##[[/size]]

+++ [[size 100%]] ###333333|@@        @@CURRENTLY I’M IN THE FINAL SEMESTER OF GRADE 11, STUDYING NATURAL SCIENCE. AFTER I LOST IN AN ART CONTEST “SHOW IT NOW 2019”, I DECIDED TO SHIFT MY FOCUS TO THE PROGRAMMING FIELD. STILL, I ADORE DRAWING WITHOUT TAKING THEM TOO SERIOUSLY. MOST OF MY WORKS ARE LEFTOVER, WHICH ARE ONLY BLACK AND WHITE, CAUSE PAINTING SUCKSSSSSS.##[[/size]]
ㅤ
[[div class="blockquote" style="max-width: fit-content; background: #538DDF; border-color: #538DDF; color: #EDEDED; font-size: 110%; margin: auto; word-break: break-all !important;"]]
++ [[size 125%]]###FFFFFF|WHAT ELSE?##[[/size]]
[[/div]]

+++ [[size 100%]] ###333333|@@        @@In my spare time, besides making art, you’ll usually find me writing fiction horror stories, translating for fun, reading books, working out, or just sitting and meditating.##[[/size]]
